verses.text: \w About|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w time|strong="G2250"\w*, \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w number|strong="G4129"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* constantly \w increasing|strong="G4129"\w*, complaints \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* Greek speaking Jews \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* Aramaic speaking Jews, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w their|strong="G1722"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w overlooked|strong="G3865"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w daily|strong="G2250"\w* distribution.

\w The|strong="G1161"\w* \w Twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, \w therefore|strong="G1161"\w*, \w called|strong="G3004"\w* together \w the|strong="G1161"\w* general \w body|strong="G4128"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, ‘\w It|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w well|strong="G3756"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* see \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* distribution \w at|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w tables|strong="G5132"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w neglect|strong="G2641"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w message|strong="G3056"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1161"\w*, friends, look \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w men|strong="G3778"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w reputation|strong="G3140"\w* \w among|strong="G1537"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G4771"\w*, wise \w and|strong="G2532"\w* spiritually-minded \w men|strong="G3778"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w appoint|strong="G2525"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* attend \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* matter;

\w while|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w*, \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w part|strong="G1473"\w*, \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w devote|strong="G4342"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G2249"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* delivery \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w message|strong="G3056"\w*.’

\w This|strong="G3588"\w* \w proposal|strong="G3056"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* unanimously agreed \w to|strong="G2532"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3588"\w* \w chose|strong="G1586"\w* \w Stephen|strong="G4736"\w* – \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3956"\w* \w full|strong="G4134"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* – \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w*, \w Prochorus|strong="G4402"\w*, \w Nicanor|strong="G3527"\w*, \w Timon|strong="G5096"\w*, \w Parmenas|strong="G3937"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Nicholas \w of|strong="G3056"\w* Antioch, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w former|strong="G3588"\w* \w convert|strong="G4339"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* Judaism;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3739"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* apostles, \w who|strong="G3739"\w*, \w after|strong="G2532"\w* \w praying|strong="G4336"\w*, \w placed|strong="G2007"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w on|strong="G5495"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w message|strong="G3056"\w* spread, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w number|strong="G3793"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* continued \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w increase|strong="G4129"\w* rapidly \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w large|strong="G4183"\w* body \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w priests|strong="G2409"\w* accepted \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w Meanwhile|strong="G1161"\w* \w Stephen|strong="G4736"\w*, divinely helped \w and|strong="G2532"\w* strengthened, \w was|strong="G3588"\w* showing \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* members \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Freed Slaves (\w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w*), \w Cyrenians|strong="G2956"\w*, Alexandrians, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Visitors \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w Cilicia|strong="G2791"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Roman \w Asia|strong="G3588"\w*, \w were|strong="G3588"\w* roused \w to|strong="G2532"\w* action \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w began|strong="G1161"\w* \w disputing|strong="G4802"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w Stephen|strong="G4736"\w*;

\w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w quite|strong="G3756"\w* \w unable|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* withstand \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* inspiration \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w induced|strong="G5260"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* assert \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* heard Stephen \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* blasphemous \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w stirred|strong="G2532"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* teachers \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Law, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w set|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* Stephen, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* arrested \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w before|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w High|strong="G2532"\w* \w Council|strong="G4892"\w*.

\w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* produced \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w gave|strong="G2532"\w* \w false|strong="G5571"\w* evidence. ‘\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*,’ \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w incessantly|strong="G3756"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* holy \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*;

\w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* heard \w him|strong="G3588"\w* declare \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w destroy|strong="G2647"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* change \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w customs|strong="G1485"\w* \w handed|strong="G3860"\w* \w down|strong="G2647"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*.’

\w The|strong="G1722"\w* eyes \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* members \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Council|strong="G4892"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* riveted \w on|strong="G1722"\w* Stephen, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w his|strong="G3956"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w looking|strong="G2532"\w* \w like|strong="G5616"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* angel.
